title: Security concerns
text:
I have used this app for many years but this year all of the reservations I have made have received phishing messages through the official messaging section of the booking.com app. The messages look official and state that there is a problem with my credit card that will result in my reservation being cancelled within 24 hours unless I click a link and ‚Äúverify‚Äù my payment. 

Each time I have had to spend nearly an hour on the phone with booking.com to find out that the message is fraudulent. 

There is clearly a problem within the booking.com platform that is not being rectified. Although a warning message has been added to the messaging portion of the app, the problem seems very serious.

I am hesitant to use this platform again in the future.

title: No communication between app and hotels
text:
I stayed at a hotel back in September and was refused service due to age (the age restriction was very hidden). I was told that I would get my refund and I waited for a few weeks without any refund. I got into contact with both Booking.com and the hotel multiple times over the course of the next few months and just told every time that the other side has the money and they can‚Äôt do the refund. Both sides have agreed with me that I deserve the refund but say that they cannot do it. 

At this point, I have given up running around between the two companies and I am out of hundreds of dollars of a hotel I was not even allowed to stay at plus the fact I had to schedule another hotel for that same night to not be stuck on the street.

If you have any issues, don‚Äôt expect anyone to figure it out for you as I have had to fight for my refund to no avail.

title: Loved our stay!
text:
Petra and Daniel were wonderful hosts!  They were generous with their time and information. The breakfast was extraordinary on both days. The location is very peaceful and private with a lovely beach just a short drive away. Would absolutely stay again if we were ever in the area.

Anne W

title: Account Disabled for no known reason
text: I‚Äôve used booking for years. I mean‚Ä¶ years. I‚Äôve never had a problem with reservations or customer service. Everything has always been great and continuously recommended to anyone. Well, not anymore!!! The last week, all of my reservations were cancelled without my doing and no explanation. I tried reaching out to customer service and the hotels. No responses that I know of because the other day when I went in to check, I found out that my account was disabled!!!! Really?!? WHY?!? No explanation and no response. Nothing. I have never had an issue. I‚Äôm really angry about this because I‚Äôve done nothing wrong for this to happen!!! Thus, I don‚Äôt recommend the site to anyone anymore. I‚Äôm not starting over. I‚Äôm done. Thanks for nothing booking.

title: Absolute Trash App
text:
Ordered hotel on booking.com via Kayak app. Was never sent a confirmation number. Was told to download booking.com app which then instead of displaying my reservation and asking for me to create an account instead just gave me options for creating account. Created with Apple ID. 

Currently have no record of confirmation number which booking.com said is required to access help line. Absolute garbage. Never have I not received a confirmation number via my submitted email. Booking.com though took my money! Garbage. Maybe worst app experience I‚Äôve ever had. And no idea if I have a confirmed reservation. Disgusted.
